name: Von's Moving & Hauling, LLC
description: Von's Moving & Hauling, LLC is a Black-owned, family-owned, and locally-owned moving company established in 2015. They offer a range of services including relocation, moving, junk removal, staging/furniture arranging, delivery, cleanouts, and piano moving. They adhere to federal and state regulations and are licensed and insured
services: Black-owned Long-distance moving in Oregon consultation
